sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些名词均有"苦恼，痛苦"之意。
sameAnalysis.word_list: agony, anguish, torment, torture, grief, misery, distress, sorrow
means: agony ：侧重指精神或身体痛苦的剧烈程度。
anguish ：指精神方面令人难以忍受的极度痛苦；用于身体时，多指局部或暂时的痛苦。
torment ：强调烦恼或痛苦的长期性。
torture ：语气比toment强，指在精神或肉体上受到的折磨所产生的痛苦。
grief ：指由某种特殊处境或原因造成的强烈的感情上的苦恼与悲痛。
misery ：着重痛苦的可悲状态，多含不幸、可怜或悲哀的意味。
distress ：多指因思想上的压力紧张、恐惧、忧虑等所引起的精神上的痛苦，也可指某种灾难带来的痛苦。
sorrow ：语气比grief弱，指因不幸、损失或失望等所产生的悲伤。

sentence.Network_en: They were sickened by the scenes of misery and degradation they found.
sentence.Network_cn: 目睹困苦、潦倒的景象，他们感到心里极不舒服。

sentence.Network_en: Their energies were focussed on the alleviation of the refugees' misery.
sentence.Network_cn: 他们把精力集中在减轻难民们的苦难上。

sentence.Network_en: All that money brought nothing but sadness and misery and tragedy.
sentence.Network_cn: 那笔钱带来的只有伤心、痛苦和悲剧。

phrase.cizu_name: make someone's life a misery (或 make life a misery

jx.jx_en_mean: cause someone severe distress by continued unpleasantness or harassment
jx.jx_cn_mean: 使生活不断苦恼（或痛苦）

phrase.cizu_name: put someone/thing out of their misery

jx.jx_en_mean: end the suffering of a person or animal in pain by killing them

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English: from Old French miserie, from Latin miseria, from miser 'wretched'

encyclopedia.content: Misery是欧洲dota后期时出现的人物，也是一代欧洲路人王。巅峰期是2009年，他和名选手LODA的Fnatic战队。后来因Fnatic赞助问题而改名EnotHome参加之后在中国的AL电视联赛，不过成绩不佳。后同样因为赞助商问题而改换新的赞助商，最终确认为Lost。 不过因为中国dota的强势以及各杯赛的垄断性胜利，Misery逐渐淡出人们视野。此外，还有同名的电影《Misery》。

example.ex: All that money brought nothing but sadness and misery and tragedy.
example.tran: 那笔钱带来的只有伤心、痛苦和悲剧。

entry.def: Misery is the way of life and unpleasant living conditions of people who are very poor.

example.ex: A tiny, educated elite profited from the misery of their two million fellow countrymen.
example.tran: 一小撮受过良好教育的精英分子从他们200万同胞的贫苦生活中获取利益。

entry.tran: 牢骚满腹者;爱抱怨的人
entry.def: If you say that someone is a misery, you are critical of them because they are always com-plaining.

example.ex: I'm not such a misery now! I gave up drink a few years back and that has changed things a lot.
example.tran: 我现在已经不喜欢抱怨了。几年之前我戒了酒，整个人就大不一样了。

entry.tran: 使生活痛苦;使日子不好过
entry.def: If someone makes your life a  misery, they behave in an unpleasant way towards you over a period of time and make you very unhappy.

example.ex: ...the gangs of kids who make our lives a misery.
example.tran: 弄得我们日子不得安宁的那几帮孩子

entry.tran: (告诉某人其急于想知道的事)消除…的忧虑
entry.def: If you put someone out of their misery, you tell them something that they are very anxious to know.

example.ex: Please put me out of my misery. How do you do it?
example.tran: 别让我着急了。你是怎样做的？

entry.tran: 将(动物)人工致死以结束其痛苦
entry.def: If you put an animal out of its misery, you kill it because it is sick or injured and cannot be cured or healed.

means.word_mean: 1. a state of ill-being due to affliction or misfortune;

sentences.sentence: "the misery and wretchedness of those slums is intolerable"
"she was exhausted by her misery and grief"

stems_affixes.word_buile: miser可怜的+able可以……的→adj.痛苦的,悲惨的
miser可怜的+y状态→n.痛苦,悲惨,不幸
com共同+miser可怜的+ate表动词→共同可怜→同情

Sentence.sentence: It is our greatest misery in life.
Distraction is the only thing that consoles us for our miseries.
the French philosopher Blaise Pascal wrote in the 17th century, "and yet it is itself the greatest of our miseries

means.word_mean: 痛苦, 苦恼, 苦难

sentences.en: The family lived in misery for several years.
sentences.cn: 这家人过了几年的痛苦生活。

sentences.en: I'm suffering the miseries of unemployment.

sentences.cn: 你这个爱抱怨的老家伙！

jushi.english: I'm suffering the miseries of unemployment.
The family lived in misery for several years.
jushi.chinese: 这家人过了几年的痛苦生活。
